page.title: 14 CHILDREN'S GAMES
page.content: {Collective Games {Rounders:}This is played with 2 teams of varying numbers. One team bats, using a long cylindrical-shaped bat whilst the other team field. It is usually played with a small hard ball. After the ball is struck, the batsman runs around a marked pitch. {Football:}This is also played with 2 teams on a marked rectangular pitch. Each team has a goal to aim at. The ball must be kicked past the opposing team to score a goal. {Individual Games The children from our village spend much time skipping, riding bicycles and seasonally playing conkers.
